thread.title_full: World's most amazing pyramids | International | Travel | Toronto Sun

author: Postmedia Network
title: World's most amazing pyramids | International | Travel | Toronto Sun
text:
Paris has announced plans to build another glass pyramid in its city -- the 180-metre-tall Tour Triangle.
The new building is expected to be complete in 2020 and will feature a four-star hotel, restaurants, office and retail spaces, a child care centre and health centre.
In honour of this new pyramid, we count down the world's top 10 pyramids.
